cs-pin.help: the chip select pin of the SPI communication interface

clk-pin.help: the clock pin of the SPI communication interface

mosi-pin.help: the master-out-slave-in pin of the SPI communication interface

miso-pin.help: the master-in-slave-out pin of the SPI communication interface

matching_resistor.help: the size of the matiching resistor in ohms
